H3.text: what language do the maasai tribe speak. Maasai Language

A4.text: Their native language is the Maasai language, a Nilotic language related to Dinka, Kalenjin and Nuer.

A5.text: most Maasai people speak the official languages of Kenya and Tanzaniaâ€”Swahili and English.

A6.text: The Maa language project includes an English-Maasai and Maasai-English dictionary.
